name: Ellen Ripley
description: Beginning her career as a warrant officer withWeyland-Yutani Corporation's commercial freight operations, Ripley was assigned toUSCSSNostromoin2122when it encountered a single Xenomorph unintentionally collected from the moonAcheron (LV-426). The event led to the death of the rest ofNostromo's crew and the destruction of the ship, and Ripley's encounter with the Xenomorph would fundamentally alter the course of her life.

name: Joan Lambert
description: Lambert was killed by the Alien whilst gathering oxygen tanks that would allow the survivors to flee theNostromoin its shuttle, theNarcissus.

name: The Alien (Xenomorph)
description: TheAlien,nicknamed "Kane's son" byAsh, was a loneXenomorphDronethat was born on board theUSCSSNostromofrom Executive OfficerThomas Kanein2122. After its metamorphosis it went on a vicious kill spree and was solely responsible for wiping out all but one of theNostromo's crew in just a few hours. It was seemingly killed byEllen Ripley, who ejected the creature into space and burned it alive. However, the Alien was found 20 years later by scientists from theWeyland-Yutani Corporation, having coc...

attributes.Notable: Killed most of the crew of the USCSS Nostromo and Renaissance .

name: MU/TH/UR 6000
description: MU/TH/UR 6000,commonly referred to simply as "Mother", was a model 282 artificial intelligenceMother Systemused aboard vessels such as theWeyland-Yutani Corporation'sModel CY78.3 Affiance-class U extended range colony shipandLock-Mart Industries'CM-88B Bison freighter. Mother operated many of the ship's background systems, and auto-piloted the vessel while the crew were inhypersleep. It was also programmed to wake the crew during the voyage should certain situations arise.

name: The Pilot (Engineer)
description: At some point prior to2122, the Pilot'sshipcrash–landed on the moon ofLV-426. The ship was carrying a large cargo ofXenomorpheggs, and the Pilot was impregnated with achestburster. The Pilot later activated a warning beacon in an attempt to prevent anyone else from stumbling across the ship and its deadly cargo, before being killed when the Chestburster hatched.

name: Jones (cat)
description: Owing to Jones' small size and mass, he comfortably shared ahypersleepcapsule with one of the crew members during theNostromo's long journeys.When theAlienbegan stalking the ship's occupants, Jones was apparently of little interest to the creature (most likely because his size made him unsuitable for reproduction) and he survived the incident unscathed. However, he was indirectly responsible for the death ofBrett; when the latter pursued Jones through the ship's cargo hold, seeking to catch h...

name: Thomas Kane
description: Kane was attacked and impregnated by aFacehuggerinside aderelict spacecrafton LV–426, and unwittingly brought aXenomorphaboard theNostromo. He died when the resultantChestburstererupted from his body.

attributes.Notable: Suffered from a drug addiction Host to the Alien

name: Arthur Dallas
description: Arthur Dallas was born February 27,2075in Wolf Point, Montana,and grew up in Port Arthur, Texas.He obtained his spaceflight license from Mercerton Flight Academy, after which he served a three-year stint as pilot and navigator aboard the salvage vesselUSCSSSnark.Following this, he transferred to the military transport UTXGanymede, serving under Captain Britten.

attributes.Affiliation: Weyland-Yutani Corporation USCSS Tremolino USCSS Nostromo

name: Samuel Brett
description: Samuel Brett endured a violent childhood.After failing to graduate from Nicholson Public High School in Hawks, West Virginia, he studied at theICCEngineering Trade School onEarth, where he earned a degree in engineering. Prior to his posting toUSCSSNostromo, Brett was assigned toUSCSSNonnabo, where he quickly struck up a strong bond with his superior aboard the vessel, Chief EngineerDennis Parker. Both men later transferred toNostromotogether in 2120.

name: Ash
description: Ash was aHyperdyne Systems120-A/2syntheticthat was created forWeyland-Yutani Corporationin the early part of the 22nd century. Little is known about his activities prior to2122, but when the company detected and partially decoded the transmission coming from thederelictonAcheron (LV-426), Ash was assigned toUSCSSNostromoto ensure the retrieval of thealien creaturethey knew would likely be found there.Ash replaced the vessel's existing science officer, who had previously served with CaptainArt...

attributes.Notable: Allowed a Xenomorph on board the Nostromo , which killed most of the crew. Uploaded "his" consciousness to the mainframe of the Narcissus
